MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:00pm due to an overhead line fault in the Hudson Grain Dryer area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:23pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
